description: This is a test suite written in Python for testing the SvelteTemplate class and related project initialization logic, including configuration loading, template processing, file creation, and script execution.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for project settings, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration for different project types, with at least SVELTE as a member.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data structure containing initial configuration info for templates, such as environment setup instructions.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Class responsible for loading configurations, initializing projects, and managing post-processing steps.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides template files from a specified directory.

classes.name: SvelteTemplate
classes.description: Template class for initializing Svelte projects, used to generate project files based on templates.

methods.name: test_svelte_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the Svelte template provides correct initial info, focusing on environment configuration commands.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that the project is correctly created from the template, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that a post-processing script is executed and signals completion by creating a marker file.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies that project configuration can be loaded properly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests that template variables within files are correctly replaced with project config values during project initialization.
